Posts.Content: hi lou, hope you dont mind me replying but i think you are a wonderful daughter your mum will be so proud of you as i am of my 3 daughters.  i to have secondary breast cancer an just at the start of my long journey , my daughters are lucky to have each other to share the ups an downs with .  never feel bad about your feelings or feel sorry because i am sure you are suffering as much as your mum but in a different way . would like to wish you all the best with your marathon such a good help . hugs for you always  t x
Posts.Title: Mum's secondary breast cancer
